casebody.data:
Charles Phillips BOND
v.
STATE. No. 143A95-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Valerie M. Pittman, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of May 2004 by Pro Se for Judicial Notice of Adjudicative Facts:

"Motion dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
